me.mnafees

Class Brick

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.mnafees.Brick

  • class Brick
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class for a brick in the game. A brick has a level attached to it as follows: 0 - invisible brick 1 - normal brick 2 - powerup brick

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private byte mLevel 
      private java.awt.Rectangle mRectangle 

    • Constructor Summary

      Create a new Brick for the game canvas.

        Draws the brick on the canvas of the game.

        height - the height of the brick

      • hasBeenHit

        boolean hasBeenHit(java.awt.Rectangle ballBounds)
        Parameters:
        ballBounds - the Rectangle bounds of the ball
        Returns:
        true if the ball has hit the brick, false otherwise
